FakesomeFest

Getting Started

Installing

Technical Overview

On this page

Installation ​

Requirements ​

  1. Knowledge of how to use File Explorer.
  2. Your Wii U's (modded with Aroma) SD Card.

TIP

You can have several Aroma environments. Consult a tutorial on how to do this.

Installing the plugin ​

First off, you're gonna want to get the custom version of the Inkay plugin.

DANGER

Please uninstall Pretendo's Inkay before installing the custom one. Your Wii U may freeze and/or crash if both are present.

After getting it, insert your Wii U SD Card and copy the FakesomeFest.wps file to wiiu/environments/aroma/plugins. Eject the SD Card, and put it back into your Wii U. You are now ready for the second step.

Applying Proxy Settings ​

This part is a bit more complicated.

Turn on your Wii U. If you had a Pretendo/Nintendo Network account, it won't work for now. Select an account you can use, make sure it has a saved password.

If it asks you for a password, just click the "back" button on the gamepad.

Go into System Settings, and navigate to Internet --> Connect to the Internet --> Saved Connections (X button). Here, you should see your Wi-Fi name. Click it, and press "Change Settings".

Navigate to the last tab, and click Proxy Settings --> Use.

Proxy Settings: ​

IP/Address: 31.220.75.208

Port: 8080

Basic Authentication: Use

Username: inkadia

Password: The same as the username.

Once you have configured the proxy settings, run a connection test. If it succeeds, great! If not, contact us on discord.

Creating a new user ​

After this, you should be sent back to the user selection screen. You need to create a new user.

Go through the steps of creating a new user like you normally would.

WARNING

DO NOT click "Yes" when it asks you if you have a NNID. This will cause a crash for whatever reason.

TIP

If you have issues in any part of the process, join our discord for support.

Deleting Shared Save Data ​

After setting up the new user, select it, and go back to System Settings. Go into Data Management --> Splatoon and delete Shared Save Data. Then, exit System Settings.

Starting Splatoon ​

When you're at the Home Menu, select the new user and open Splatoon. If it hangs at the squid loading screen, go to our discord for support. If you are able to get to the tutorial, you have completed the guide!

Good luck in November! ​
